name: HOPS-Healthy Options Project Skopje
goal: Promotion, respect and protection of the human rights and freedoms towards improvement of health and socioeconomic status of all people, especially drug users, sex workers and other marginalized groups, based on the principles of harm reduction, by equal access to services, community strengthening, capacity building, research, analyses and advocacy.
interests: Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives:
-European Drug Strategy and Action plan
-Realization of Bremen Declaration on HIV/AIDS
-EU directives on non-discrimination
